name: Hexemon
description:
Hexemon is a fast-paced, turn-based, multiplayer 4x game. Its easy to learn gameplay uses card mechanics from games like Hearthstone. It is built from the ground-up for multiplayer. All players take their turns simultaneously. Games take less than an hour. Every turn has consequential decisions.

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/rySTNdz

Sign up for more information at our website: http://www.maintanksoftware.com/hexemon.html
